message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you the product for $12,000. I believe it's a fair price considering its value.
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,000. I'm interested in the product, but I'm on a budget.
Bob, I understand your budget constraints, but $12,000 is already a very competitive price for this product. I could meet you halfway at $10,500, but that's my best offer.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I was really hoping to get closer to my budget. How about $9,500? I'm willing to compromise, but I need to make sure it fits within my budget.
